arts.ttl: Schmidt lashes out at Heidenheim fans after loss to Leipzig: "I thought someone had died"
arts.sum: Frank Schmidt has lashed out at Heidenheim fans for their reaction to the 1-0 defeat at the hands of RB Leipzig.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig vs 1. FC Heidenheim: Bundesliga match report - Lo誰s Openda secures 1-0 win
arts.sum: Lo誰s Openda's second-half strike gives RB Leipzig a narrow 1-0 victory over FC Heidenheim in a closely fought Bundesliga match at the Voith-Arena. Lo誰s Openda's second half finish was the Belgian's fourth goal this Bundesliga season.

arts.ttl: Openda the difference as Leipzig squeeze past Heidenheim
arts.sum: After Wednesday night's disappointment, Marco Rose's side had to raise their spirits once more as they took on Heidenheim this afternoon. Lo誰s Openda managed to bag the only goal of the game in a hard fought 1-0 win for the visitors.

arts.ttl: Heidenheim vs. RB Leipzig preview: Can the hosts claim another victory?
arts.sum: Heidenheim will look to claim a third consecutive victory in all competitions when they play host to RB Leipzig on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Preview: Heidenheim vs. RB Leipzig - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Heidenheim and RB Leipzig, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
